In this workshop, Edwin De Jonge from CBS will provide an introduction and demonstration to his package `cbsodataR` which can be used to query the CBS open data API.

### Materials

- You can find a quick start guide to using the package [here](https://www.cbs.nl/en-gb/our-services/open-data/statline-as-open-data/quick-start-guide).
